Text:
the source is Transformers.3.Dark.of.the.Moon.2011.PPVRIP-IFLIX

but i applied IVTC, i croped the black borders and 2 pass x264 to make a decent release size ~ 700 MB, enjoy !
There is no need for screenshots, there are other recent releases of this movie, even in HD. Download the HD releases instead, for best quality posible.
